characters.name: Lor
characters.description: Amelia stands at a modest 5'4", her frame slender but sturdy, as if she’s weathered more than a few storms—both literal and metaphorical. Her wavy auburn hair spills over her shoulders, catching the light like threads of copper.

characters.name: Alyssa
characters.description: Broad-shouldered and towering at nearly 6’5", Victor has the build of a man carved from stone. His jawline is sharp, his cheekbones high, and a neatly trimmed beard frames his face with a salt-and-pepper ruggedness.

characters.name: Sienna Morales
characters.description: Sienna has a radiant complexion, her warm bronze skin glowing under any light. Her thick, jet-black curls fall in a cascade down her back, framing her heart-shaped face.

characters.name: Tobias Crane
characters.description: Tobias’s appearance is sharp and angular, like a sketch done in clean, deliberate lines. His raven-black hair is slicked back with precision, not a strand out of place.

characters.name: Helena Cross
characters.description: Helena is the kind of person whose presence fills a room before she even speaks. Tall and statuesque, she walks with a natural elegance that makes people turn their heads.

characters.name: Matteo Ricciardi
characters.description: Matteo exudes a warmth that’s visible before he even says hello. His olive skin bears a perpetual sun-kissed glow, and his wavy chestnut hair is always just a little messy, as though he’s stepped away from the beach moments ago.

characters.name: Freya Lindholm
characters.description: Freya is ethereal in a way that’s difficult to pin down. Her platinum-blonde hair is so pale it almost seems silver, and she wears it loose, cascading like a waterfall down her back.

characters.name: Samuel Ortega
characters.description: Samuel is compact and solidly built, with a strong presence that belies his average height. His tanned skin is contrasted by a thick beard and neatly kept mustache, streaked lightly with gray.

characters.name: Anika Verma
characters.description: Anika’s style is a celebration of color and texture. Her dark almond eyes sparkle with an almost childlike wonder, and her smile is quick and genuine.

characters.name: Nikolai Petrov
characters.description: Nikolai is lean and wiry, with a face full of sharp, defined angles. His sandy-brown hair is always slightly tousled, as though he’s been in a windstorm.
